H0.text: The population is small is the condition under which the Hardy-Weinberg law is only valid.

H1.text: Migration into the population is occurring is the condition under which the Hardy‑Weinberg law is only valid.

H2.text: Immigration into the population is occurring is the condition under which the Hardy‑Weinberg law is only valid.
